newsitem.title: CANADA: HORSE RACING-BREEDERS' CUP POST POSITIONS.
newsitem.headline: HORSE RACING-BREEDERS' CUP POST POSITIONS.

text.p: Post positions after the draw on Wednesday for the seven-race Breeders' Cup on Saturday (list under post position, horse, trainer, jockey and odds: e-entry; f-field)

1. Dare and Go, Richard Mandella, Alex Solis, 6-1e 2. Formal Gold, Perry William, Mike Smith 20-1f 3. Taiki Blizzard, Kazuo Fujisawa, Yukio Okabe, 20-1 4. Mt.
